scripts.dependency-cruiser-graphical: current_time=$(date +'%Y-%m-%d_%H:%M') && npx depcruise --output-type dot --do-not-follow '^node_modules($|/)' adapters cases configs use-cases users | dot -T svg > ../../architecture/dependency-cruiser/functions/dependency-graph_${current_time}.svg
scripts.dependency-cruiser-ci: npx depcruise --output-type err-long adapters cases configs use-cases users
